commands./start: Hello, I'm Telegram bot for news!
commands./help:
/help - list of commands
/start - starts bot
/stop - stops current command
/new_docs - send last articles to you
/new_topics - send last topics to you
/topic - send the description of given topic
/doc - send a text of given article 
/words - main words about given topic
/describe_doc - statistics about given article
/describe_topic - statistics about given topic
/beautiful_topic - main words about topic in one picture
